com.example.demo.service

Class QuestionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.demo.service.QuestionService

  • @Service
public class QuestionService
extends java.lang.Object
    Question service, provides logical operations for GET and POST rest methods.

      • createReply

        public ReplyDTO createReply(ReplyDTO replyDTO,
                            java.lang.Long id)
        Method converts reply DTO to entity, finds question by questionId, saves reply in the repository, converts reply to DTO, returns reply DTO.
        Parameters:
        replyDTO - is a reply object which will be converted to entity and saved to database
        id - is a number with questionId
        Returns:
        ReplyDTO
        Throws:
        RecordNotFoundException - is thrown when specific question is not found
